Package eu.semagrow.core.impl.planner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlanGenerator
    The interface that describes the possible methods to construct plans out of expressions and combine plans to more complex ones.
    PlanOptimizer
    Plan Optimizer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BindingSetAssignmentCollector
    Created by angel on 2/11/2015.
    Cost
    A simple data structure for describing a cost of an execution plan.
    DecomposerContext
    Decomposer Context
    DPPlanOptimizer
    A plan optimizer that uses Dynamic Programming to search for an optimal plan with respect to a CostEstimator
    DPPlanOptimizer.PairSubsetIterator<T>  
    DPPlanOptimizer.SubsetsIterator<T>  
    DPQueryDecomposer
    Dynamic Programming Query Decomposer
    Ordering
    Created by angel on 10/2/14.
    Plan
    Created by angel on 9/30/14.
    PlanCollection
    Created by angel on 9/30/14.
    PlanGeneratorImpl
    The default implementation of the @{link PlanGenerator}
    PlanProperties
    A structure that contains the @{link Plan} properties needed by the PlanOptimizer.
    PlanPropertiesUpdater
    A PlanVisitor that traverses the execution plan tree and updates the properties derived by the operator specifications
    PlanUtil  
    PlanVisitorBase<X extends Exception>
    Created by angel on 21/4/2015.
    Site
